```sh

check for inactive subscriptions using hammer

hammer host list –search ‘last_checkin < “30 minutes ago”’

search for host in satellite

hammer host info –name servername

delete host from Satellite server

hammer host delete –name servername

delete host from Satellite from client

subscription-manager remove –all subscription-manager unregister subscription-manager clean
